text: The drug combination aliskiren/amlodipine/hydrochlorothiazide (INNs, trade name Amturnide) is an antihypertensive approved in the United States on 21 December 2010.Amturnide approval letter. U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA). == References == ==External links== * Category:Combination drugs Category:Novartis brands
title: Aliskiren/amlodipine/hydrochlorothiazide
